description.name: Sota Iguchi
description.role: Undergraduate student at the University of Electro-Communications

about.title: About me
about.description: I am a third-year student in the Media Science and Engineering Program at the University of Electro-Communications in Japan. I am majoring in informatics and computer engineering. I began programming at the age of ten. I am interested in web development, particularly front-end development. I also enjoy working with various programming languages and frameworks.

works.title: Works
works.description: Here are some of my works. You can find more on my GitHub.

articles.title: Articles
articles.description: I write articles about my interests and experiences. (I am sorry, but most of them are in Japanese.)
articles.readMore: You can read more articles on Qiita and Zenn.

prizes.title: Prizes
prizes.description: I have received several awards for my work in programming and development.

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.description: I have obtained various certifications in programming and related fields.

history.title: History
history.description: Here is a brief history of my activities and achievements.
